v-model:show.description: Whether or not to display a pop-up layer

position.description_zh: 弹出位置，可选值为 `top` `bottom` `right` `left` center

overlay.description: Whether or not to display the mask layer

overlay-class.description: Customize the class of the mask layer

overlay-style.description: Customize the style of the mask layer

default-style.description: Whether to enable the default style

lock-scroll.description: Whether to prohibit scroll penetration, when disabled, scrolling pop-up layer will not cause scrolling of the body
lock-scroll.description_zh: 是否禁止滚动穿透，禁止时滚动弹出层不会引发 body 的滚动

close-on-click-overlay.description: Whether to click the mask layer to close the pop-up layer
close-on-click-overlay.description_zh: 是否点击遮罩层关闭弹出层

teleport.description: The location where the pop-up layer is mounted

safe-area.description: Whether to enable the bottom safe zone adaptation
safe-area.description_zh: 是否开启底部安全区适配

safe-area-top.description: Whether to enable top security zone adaptation
safe-area-top.description_zh: 是否开启顶部安全区适配

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the pop-up layer is opened

events.name: opened
events.description: Triggers when the pop-up layer animation ends
events.description_zh: 打开弹出层动画结束时触发

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the pop-up layer is turned off

events.name: closed
events.description: Turn off the pop-up layer animation to trigger at the end of the animation
events.description_zh: 关闭弹出层动画结束时触发

events.name: click-overlay
events.description: Triggered when the mask layer is clicked
